ygData.subject: Re: rumors
ygData.msgSnippet: What lvl is your tinkering at.. Also it isn t as expensive as some of the trade skills :) What IS the difference between a large lantern and Flameless.  I
ygData.messageBody:
What lvl is your tinkering at.. Also it isn't as expensive as some of the trade skills :)

What IS the difference between a large lantern and Flameless. I can't tell.

<-- Enigma -->
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: lukas@... [SMTP:lukas@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 7:04 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] rumors

From: lukas@...

At 04:33 PM 6/7/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Chad Maloney <opercmm@...-hulman.edu>
>
>
>I read someone finally got their tinkering skill to go up. I've
>burnt through about 24 plat of Flameless Lanterns and had nothing
>go up. Anyone know how long it takes? Is it just luck?
>

My skill is going up quite nicely on lanterns, and they are still not
trivial. I'm getting similar increases to when I was trying to get
blacksmithing up. Getting that first point sure was a surprise though,
after having experimented trying to make everything recently it never went
up. I'm level 27 BTW so it had nothing to do with not having the
appropriate level. Making the lanterns is a bit expensive, however, about
1pp5gp a pop... you get 8gp or so selling back to vendors. Will need to do
some more Sand Giant hunting with my guild to fund this skill :)

-Luke

EQ tinkering site:
http://home1.gte.net/jlukas/eq/tinker.htm
Updated: 6-8-99
